info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 07 at 2:38AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...HEAVY SNOW BAND... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. This band of heavy snow is producing heavy snow at the rate of up to around an inch per hour at times. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 235 AM EST, a band of heavy snow was along a line extending from near Livingstonville to Savoy and moving northeast at 20 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Albany, Schenectady, Troy, Pittsfield, Bennington, Clifton Park, Rotterdam, East Greenbush, Cohoes, North Adams, Brattleboro, Watervliet, Rensselaer, Colonie, Scotia, Mechanicville, Hoosick Falls, Chatham, Nassau, and Delmar. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between exits 10 and 25. Interstate 890 between exits 4b and 9. Interstate 87 between exits 21B and 7, and between exits 8A and 10. Interstate 787 between exits 1 and 9. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
